page.title: 14OUR POSTMAN
page.content: We interviewed{Mr Pidgeon,}the postman. He gets up at 4.15am and has puffed wheat for breakfast. He starts work at 5.00am and sorts letters until 6.00am. From 6.00am to 7.00am he puts his own delivery into the right tin. Then he loads up his van and drives to {Charmouth.}After his first deliveries he stops at two houses for a cup of tea. At 10.30am he completes his round at{Charmouth.} He drives to {Monkton Wylde}and completes his round at 11.30am. Then he drives back to{Charmouth}and clears four letter boxes. Then he picks up any parcels that need to be delivered. Later he drives to{Morcombelake}Post Office. Then he drives back to {Bridport}to fill up his van with petrol. He goes home at 12.15pm. His favourite pop group is{Queen.}
